sea-snake | 2024-05-03 09:42:28 UTC | #2

... value = { Text: ...

Should probably be:

... value = variant { Text: ...

asjn3e | 2024-05-06 20:12:46 UTC | #3

here is an example that worked for me
```
vec {
 record {
      \"icrc1:logo\";
      variant {
        Text = \"data:image/svg+xml;base64,\"
      };
    };
},

```
Just dont forget the back slashes, otherwise you will face these errors 
```
  ┌─ Candid argument:8:12
  │
8 │       icrc1:logo;
  │            ^ Unexpected token
  │
  = Expects "="
```

```
10 │         Text = data:image/svg+xml
   │                ^^^^ Unexpected token
```
